detail_desc: Oversized, one-shoulder, rib-knit jumper in a cotton blend with an asymmetric cut at the top and long dolman sleeves.

Fleece-lined hats in jersey with reflective print motifs.

Set with a sweatshirt and joggers in fast-drying functional fabric. Block-coloured top with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, seams at the knees and ribbing at the hems.

Set with a sweatshirt and joggers in fast-drying functional fabric. Block-coloured top with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, seams at the knees and ribbing at the hems.

Sports top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric with reflective print motifs. Stand-up collar, mesh-lined hood, twisted seams at the front, jacquard-knit inside and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Narrow elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, opening at the top and small frilled collar with ties at the front. Raglan sleeves with smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs.
Denim shirt with a collar, press-studs down the front and short, cut-off sleeves with raw edges. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud and a rounded hem with split seams.

Padded parka with a lined, faux fur-trimmed hood and a zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets and a small zipped pocket on each sleeve. Inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and zip down the front. Zipped front pockets with taped seams, ribbed cuffs and a fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
